alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Itasca, north central Cass and Koochiching Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 628 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Pelland, to 7 miles northeast of Big Falls, to near Bena, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Littlefork around 645 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Inger, Oslund and International Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. These storms may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Minnesota.
